name: Unseen Servant
flavorText: Why bother with real servants when magical ones are so much more obedient?
duration: Until your next extended rest or until you dismiss the servant
text: You conjure a Medium unseen servant of invisible force. It obeys your commands, moves at your speed, can lift up to 100 pounds, and performs basic functions and repetitive tasks, such as cleaning, making camp, and moving, holding, or carrying objects. An unseen servant never tires. It cannot move more than 20 squares from your space. It does not occupy any space and cannot attack or be attacked. Each unseen servant you currently control doubles the component cost to create the next. Focus: A ceramic hand. The person who holds this focus is empowered to command any unseen servants summoned with it. If the focus is broken or not in anyoneâ€™s possession for a minute or longer, all unseen servants bound to it disappear.
componentCost: 20 gp, plus a focus worth at least 25 gp
